beer.description: A shiny can of mmm... beer.
beer.name: Beer

butterfly-milk.description: A vial of butterfly milk. It has the tingly effervescence of a thousand tiny butterfly farts.
butterfly-milk.name: Butterfly Milk

cloud-11-smoothie.description: A Cloud 11 smoothie. Pretty much the best smoothie ever invented in the history of smoothies.
cloud-11-smoothie.name: Cloud 11 Smoothie

cloudberry-daiquiri.description: A nourishing cloudberry daiquiri. It goes down smooth.
cloudberry-daiquiri.name: Cloudberry Daiquiri

coffee.description: A steaming mug of strong, life-affirming coffee.
coffee.name: Coffee

crabato-juice.description: Mmm... all the goodness of crab juice, plus tomatoes!
crabato-juice.name: Crabato Juice

cup-of-water.description: This water is so plain, it has no Brownian motion, but Beigien motion instead. Drink at own risk.
cup-of-water.name: Cup of Water

exotic-juice.description: A goblet of mysteriously yummy exotic juice.
exotic-juice.name: Exotic Juice

face-smelter.description: A powerful brew with a scent acrid enough to perm your nostril hairs.
face-smelter.name: Face Smelter

fruity-juice.description: A glass of nigh-ambrosial fruit juice.
fruity-juice.name: Fruity Juice

hooch.description: One jug of premium high-octane hooch.
hooch.name: Hooch

lemon-juice.description: A tall glass of exquisitely sour lemon juice.
lemon-juice.name: Lemon Juice

mabbish-coffee.description: A Mabbish coffee has all the goodness of regular coffee, but gooder.
mabbish-coffee.name: Mabbish Coffee

mega-healthy-veggie-juice.description: A bracing tumbler of mega-healthy veggie juice.
mega-healthy-veggie-juice.name: Mega Healthy Veggie Juice

orange-juice.description: A surprising glass of orange juice.
orange-juice.name: Orange Juice

pumpkin-ale.description: All the refreshment of beer combined with the autumnal savoury heft of pumpkin. Then combined with cinnamon. For no reason anyone can decipher.
pumpkin-ale.name: Pumpkin Ale

savory-smoothie.description: A savory smoothie. It sticks to your ribs and doesn't let go.
savory-smoothie.name: Savory Smoothie

slow-gin-fizz.description: A low and lazy slow gin fizz.
slow-gin-fizz.name: Slow Gin Fizz

spicy-grog.description: A tall glass of exceedingly spicy grog.
spicy-grog.name: Spicy Grog

wine-of-the-dead.description: A forbidding decanter filled with wine of the dead, made from grapes crushed in Purgatory. This Hade-licious drink will revive even the most pooped of hellions... but will kill all who drink it aboveground. Pour it on cultivated items in your home street or yard to unreap what you've sown. Beware its cursed powers!
wine-of-the-dead.name: Wine of the Dead

abbasid-ribs.description: Succulent Abbasid ribs, made using a time-honored Abbasidian recipe.
abbasid-ribs.name: Abbasid Ribs

apple.description: A boldly red and brazenly juicy apple.
apple.name: Apple

applejack.description: A bowl of apple-y, oat-y, cinnamon-y applejack. Yummy hot or cold.
applejack.name: Applejack

awesome-stew.description: Chunky awesome stew, so thick you can eat it with a spork.
awesome-stew.name: Awesome Stew

bacon.description: A delicious, greasy, surprise Piggy treat from the Piggy's newly discovered Orthogonal Meat Generator (OMG).
bacon.name: Rasher of Bacon

banana-no-names.description: One banana fried to crispy, buttery perfection and drizzled with honey. Mmmm.
banana-no-names.name: Banana No-Names

berry-bowl.description: A very merry bowl of berries.
berry-bowl.name: Berry Bowl

best-bean-dip.description: Bowl of beany, dippy bean dip.
best-bean-dip.name: Best Bean Dip

big-salad.description: It's bigger than small. It's a big salad.
big-salad.name: Big Salad

birch-candy.description: Candy made of boiled birch syrup so concentrated and so sweet that one too many and you may see god. Or at least the tooth fairy. And they'll be crying.
birch-candy.name: Birch Candy

birch-syrup.description: A bottle of sticky birch syrup.
birch-syrup.name: Birch Syrup

blue-sno-cone.description: A delicious, refreshing Blue Sno Cone with a tangy hit of iMG. Blended to perfection using ice, hooch, and the very finest elemental additives and preservatives, it tastes exactly what the the concept of blue should taste like. And a little like raspberry, weirdly.
blue-sno-cone.name: Blue Sno Cone

bubble-and-squeak.description: Meaty, carroty, potato-y mush, fried to perfection.
bubble-and-squeak.name: Bubble and Squeak

bunch-of-grapes.description: A heaping handful of red grapes.
bunch-of-grapes.name: Bunch of Grapes

butterfly-butter.description: Butterfly butter might seem like an odd thing, but it is used in many delicious cooking recipes.
butterfly-butter.name: Butterfly Butter

carobish-treats.description: A chewy, crunchy, apparently ethically-sourced, gritty 'candy-alternative' with a whiff of winter. Leaves a unique chocolatey aftertang you can't quite put your finger on.
carobish-treats.name: Raw Bio-Organic Carob-ish Treat

cedar-plank-salmon.description: A wild salmon cooked on a wild cedar plank.
cedar-plank-salmon.name: Cedar Plank Salmon

cheese.description: A nice wedge of holey cheese.
cheese.name: Cheese

cheezy-sauce.description: A crock full of pleasingly, teasingly cheezy sauce.
cheezy-sauce.name: Cheezy Sauce

chillybusting-chili.description: A tureen of fiery chilly-busting chili.
chillybusting-chili.name: Chilly-Busting Chili

choice-crudites.description: A platter of the very finest crudites.
choice-crudites.name: Choice Crudites

cloudberry-jam.description: A jar of tart cloudberry jam.
cloudberry-jam.name: Cloudberry Jam

common-crudites.description: Everyday crudites served in an easy-to-carry cup.
common-crudites.name: Common Crudites

corn-off-the-cob.description: All the goodness of corn-on-the-cob, without the cob.
corn-off-the-cob.name: Corn-off-the-Cob

corn-syrup-squares.description: Densely-packed brick of pure brain-melting sweetness, proving that sometimes the sum of many food items is either something that is only fit for use as building material in a fairy unicorn happy-palace, or a candy.
corn-syrup-squares.name: Hi-Sucrose Corn Syrup Square

creamy-catsup.description: One gallon of the creamiest catsup in all the land.
creamy-catsup.name: Creamy Catsup

death-to-veg.description: For those who wish a violent end to all harmless vegetables, and desire to feast upon their flesh.
death-to-veg.name: Death to Veg

desssert-rub.description: Gritty, sandlike, and strangely sweet, this is both sandy like the desert, and sweet like dessert, and, as such, has the s's of both.
desssert-rub.name: Desssert Rub

eggy-scramble.description: A messily scrumptious pile of eggs.
eggy-scramble.name: Eggy Scramble

exotic-fruit-salad.description: An enticing array of exotic fruits.
exotic-fruit-salad.name: Exotic Fruit Salad

expensive-grilled-cheese.description: Expensive cheese expensively grilled on expensive bread.
expensive-grilled-cheese.name: Expensive Grilled Cheese

flummery.description: Few things in this life are as tasty as a masterfully prepared flummery. "Just like Mom used to make!" you might say. If you had a mom, that is.
flummery.name: Flummery

fortifying-gruel.description: One bowl of lumpy fortifying gruel.
fortifying-gruel.name: Fortifying Gruel

fried-noodles.description: A small slippery hill of fried noodles.
fried-noodles.name: Fried Noodles

fried-rice.description: A bowl of fried rice with lots of nummy bits.
fried-rice.name: Fried Rice

frog-in-a-hole.description: A perfect egg perfectly fried in a perfect hole in a slice of bread.
frog-in-a-hole.name: Frog-in-a-Hole

gammas-pancakes.description: One mouthwatering pancake, just like Gamma used to make.
gammas-pancakes.name: Gamma's Pancake

glitchepoix.description: Combination of vegetables known as the holy quadrinity of the Glitchean cuisine.
glitchepoix.name: Glitchepoix

greasy-frybread.description: A fresh chunk of butter-running-down-your-arms greasy frybread.
greasy-frybread.name: Greasy Frybread

green.description: So fundamental, so intrinsic to the basic laws of culinary science and a healthy spleen that there was only ever one word needed to describe it: Green. So, so green.
green.name: Green

green-eggs.description: One order of fried green eggs, hold the ham.
green-eggs.name: Green Egg

green-sno-cone.description: A bright green blend of ice, hooch and elements make a drink the color of days when spring is born, or nights when the northern lights perform. Packed with a modest hit of iMG, winter cannot fade it. Mainly because it's 40% elemental additives and preservatives.
green-sno-cone.name: Green Sno Cone

hash.description: A serving of oddly satisfying hash.
hash.name: Hash

hearty-groddle-sammich.description: A meaty Groddle sammich with extra hot 'n' fizzy sauce for extra hot 'n' fizzy energy.
hearty-groddle-sammich.name: Hearty Groddle Sammich

heston-mash.description: This is not just mashed potato, this is the fanciest, zaniest, most delicious mashed potato Ur has ever ingested. And yet, really, it's still just mashed potato.
heston-mash.name: Heston Mash

honey.description: A brimful jar of raw golden honey.
honey.name: Honey

hot-n-fizzy-sauce.description: One jar of potent hot 'n' fizzy sauce. This combustible comestible is packed with energy and all kinds of flaming goodness.
hot-n-fizzy-sauce.name: Hot 'n' Fizzy Sauce

hot-potatoes.description: If a glitch gives you this 'tato, drop it like it's hot. Because it is.
hot-potatoes.name: Hot Potatoes

hungry-nachos.description: Are you hungry for nachos or are nachos hungry for you? It's nacho decision to make.
hungry-nachos.name: Hungry Nachos

ixstyle-braised-meat.description: A side of rich, meaty meat, braised a la Ix.
ixstyle-braised-meat.name: Ix-Style Braised Meat

juicy-carpaccio.description: A tempting platter of juicy carpaccio with all the trimmings.
juicy-carpaccio.name: Juicy Carpaccio

king-of-condiments.description: Otherwise known as the blandest rub in all of Ur. Meh.
king-of-condiments.name: King of Condiments

lazy-salad.description: Sliced tomatoes and cheese. It doesn't get much lazier than a lazy salad.
lazy-salad.name: Lazy Salad

legumes-abbassidienne.description: The most sophisticated, chic ways to prepare a bean: simply, classically, with a smile, a touch of flair, and a really big guillotine.
legumes-abbassidienne.name: Legumes Abbassidienne

lemburger.description: A single-decker Lemburger with all the fixins.
lemburger.name: Lemburger

lemon.description: One half of a nice pair of lemons.
lemon.name: Lemon

luxury-tortellini.description: It's tortellini, stuffed with extravagance and drizzled with grandeur.
luxury-tortellini.name: Luxury Tortellini

maburger-royale.description: It's not just seasoned beans in a bun smothered in stinky cheese - it's so much more than that. Oh no wait. It's just that.
maburger-royale.name: Maburger Royale

meat-gumbo.description: A bowl of thick, meaty gumbo.
meat-gumbo.name: Meat Gumbo

mexicali-eggs.description: A heaping serving of bean-infused eggs.
mexicali-eggs.name: Mexicali Eggs

mild-sauce.description: Bland ho! It's some inoffensive mild sauce.
mild-sauce.name: Mild Sauce

naraka-flame-rub.description: A slightly spicy minute on the lips, a horrifically painful burning in the general area of the hips, some people say. But what do they know? Wussies.
naraka-flame-rub.name: Naraka Flame Rub

oaty-cake.description: A slightly dry, somewhat crumbly oaty cake.
oaty-cake.name: Oaty Cake

oily-dressing.description: A bottle of cheap, yet strangely satisfying, oily dressing.
oily-dressing.name: Oily Dressing

olive-oil.description: A bottle of top-notch olive oil, no virgins required.
olive-oil.name: Olive Oil

onion-ring.description: Battered and fried, these are onions prepared the way Pot intended. Rumored to be popular amongst the elves. Wait, what's an elf?
onion-ring.name: Onion Ring

onion-sauce.description: A jar of eye-wateringly zesty onion sauce.
onion-sauce.name: Onion Sauce

orange-sno-cone.description: A chillingly refreshing bright Orange Sno Cone, with a medium amount of iMG. A perfect blend of Ice, Hooch, and elemental additives and preservatives, it is the epitome of an orange drink. Not orange the fruit, that is, orange the colour. It's more of a concept.
orange-sno-cone.name: Orange Sno Cone

pad-tii.description: Tii has not heard of this dish yet. Chances are it would not approve. Do not tell Tii. Please.
pad-tii.name: Pad Tii

pi.description: The recipe for Pi was described in ancient times by Alphimedes of Salatu, who also purportedly invented a heat ray for attacking the Rook. (If the heat ray ever existed, it has long since been lost.) It was later improved upon by Ludolph the Cerulean, named for his bright blue skin. Ludolph gave a Pi to several of the giants. Tii immediately stated that Pi was irrational. Pot, on the other hand, declared this to be the best pie he’d ever eaten - transcendental, in fact.
pi.name: Pi

pineapple-upside-down-pizza.description: A plate of exotically topsy-turvy pizza.
pineapple-upside-down-pizza.name: Pineapple Upside-Down Pizza

pocket-salmon.description: It's like salmon, but in your pocket! Pocket Salmon! The handy friendly fish-at-your-fingertips that's always ready to go! Why settle for boring old underwater catch-me-if-you-calmon-salmon when you could have the ever-accessible, always-dependable, never-stinky always-yummy Pocket Salmon instead! POCKET SALMON! [TM. Always read the label. Terms and conditions apply]
pocket-salmon.name: Pocket Salmon

potato-patty.description: One potato, mashed and fried in a pleasing disc shape.
potato-patty.name: Potato Patty

potcorn.description: Pot corn is a regular corn made to pop because its kernels have a hard moisture-sealed hull and a dense starchy interior. This allows pressure to build inside the kernel until an explosive "pop" results.
potcorn.name: Potcorn

potians-feast.description: The greatest, most magnificent, energy-filled, Pot-approved combination of nourishment. A fitting dish to make or eat for any serious Potian.
potians-feast.name: Potian's Feast

pottine.description: So wrong. But so, so right.
pottine.name: Pottine

precious-potato-salad.description: Potato salad, traditionally an affordable staple at Glitchen birthdays, is now fit for fancy dinners and lavish banquets with the addition of the particularly precious Trump Rub.
precious-potato-salad.name: Precious Potato Salad

proper-rice.description: A steaming bowl of slightly sticky rice.
proper-rice.name: Proper Rice

pumpkin-pie.description: When people use the phrase 'as nice as pie', they are, in fact, talking about this pie. What goes into it? Fresh pumpkin, crispy pastry, spicy spices, and a big dollop of love. (That's an attitude rather than a hidden ingredient, before you start feeling nauseous).
pumpkin-pie.name: Pumpkin Pie

purple-sno-cone.description: A refreshing and delicious purple Sno Cone. A sophisticated blend of Ice, Hooch and elemental additives and preservatives. Now you too can get all the social frisson of Purple but with none of the nutritional or mental expansion benefits (contains considerable iMG, though).
purple-sno-cone.name: Purple Sno Cone

rainbo-sno-cone.description: A rainbo in Sno Cone form, eating this blend of all the other Sno Cones makes your tongue tingle, your sinuses snigger and your spine spontaneously decide to go on a tropical vacation to Shimmyville. Warning: Contains gloriously high levels of iMG.
rainbo-sno-cone.name: Rainbo Sno Cone

red.description: Some things are so basic, so fundamental that they only need one word to describe what they are. This perfect blend of tomato, onion and butterfly milk sums up the essence of red.
red.name: Red

red-sno-cone.description: A tongue-tingling spine-shiveringly Red Sno Cone. A seamless blend of Ice, Hooch, and a secret blend of elemental additives, preservatives, iMG and raw energy that make you feel slightly, though not to any copyright-infringing extent, like you may have wings.
red-sno-cone.name: Red Sno Cone

rich-tagine.description: A steaming pot of zesty, slow-cooked tagine.
rich-tagine.name: Rich Tagine

roasted-pepitas.description: Crunchy, nutty, seeds pulled from a pumpkin ready roasted (it must be that hot knife you used). May cause a roasted pumpkin to grow in your stomach. No, not really. Will cause you to feel smug about your healthy snacking choices, though.
roasted-pepitas.name: Roasted Pepitas

salmon-jaella.description: An assortment of fresh Salmon from Jal, Rice, Legumes and veggies thrown together into a dish Jal-loving Glitchen identify themselves by.
salmon-jaella.name: Salmon Jaella

secret-sauce.description: An enigmatic jar full of mysteriously yummy secret sauce.
secret-sauce.name: Secret Sauce

simple-bbq.description: Some hot meat with tangy sauce.
simple-bbq.name: Simple BBQ

snack-pack.description: An apple, some cheese, and a couple of pickles. Not quite a meal, but it'll do until dinner.
snack-pack.name: Snack Pack

stinky-cheese.description: A lump of cheese that's been left to stand around for a while. It's what the French call 'ripe'. You could age it longer, but glory only knows what the French would call it then.
stinky-cheese.name: Stinky Cheese

stock-sauce.description: As plain and every day as a woman laughing while eating salad, no one even things about Stock Sauce any more. Perhaps they should.
stock-sauce.name: Stock Sauce

super-veggie-kebabs.description: Chunks of assorted vegetables on a fun pointy stick!
super-veggie-kebabs.name: Super Veggie Kebab

swank-zucchini-loaf.description: A good loaf can be made out of anything. A great loaf is made from Zucchini and talks about how rich it is.
swank-zucchini-loaf.name: Swank Zucchini Loaf

sweet-n-sour-sauce.description: Is it sweet? Is it sour? It's both! It's sweet 'n' sour sauce!
sweet-n-sour-sauce.name: Sweet 'n' Sour Sauce

swing-batter.description: After roughly chopping with a knife, this batter is not mixed, blended or whisked, but swung at the end of the arm. Swing batter, batter batter swing, batter (as they say).
swing-batter.name: Swing Batter

tangy-noodles.description: A generous serving of zesty, lemony tangy noodles.
tangy-noodles.name: Tangy Noodles

tangy-sauce.description: A large jar of gloppy tangy sauce.
tangy-sauce.name: Tangy Sauce

tasty-pasta.description: A bowl of extra-long noodles with rich bolognese sauce.
tasty-pasta.name: Tasty Pasta

trump-rub.description: So called because it trumps all the other rubs in expense, flavour, and the ability to be extremely annoying (if you get it in your eye).
trump-rub.name: Trump Rub

urfu.description: A moist beige flaccid matter, imbued with the ability to suck up other flavours.
urfu.name: Urfu

vegmageddon.description: No rich urth-born root or brave brassica can survive the searing heat of a Pugilist Grill. It is a slow, vicious end for them. But justified, they say, in the name of 'Healthy Living'.
vegmageddon.name: Vegmageddon

very-stinky-cheese.description: Smelling like a manatee bathed in celery juice and old surgical stockings,  goodness knows what would happen if you aged this connoisseurial cheese any longer. You could give it a go, though…
very-stinky-cheese.name: Very Stinky Cheese

very-very-stinky-cheese.description: This is the very, very stinkiest cheese you've ever seen, or it would be if you could see through the thick veil of tears it's inducing. You can't make this any stinkier. It wouldn't be fair to everyone else.
very-very-stinky-cheese.name: Very, Very Stinky Cheese

wavy-gravy.description: One pint of wavy gravy. It's so good, you'll eat it with a spoon.
wavy-gravy.name: Wavy Gravy

whortleberry-jelly.description: One jar of homemade whortleberry jelly, made from the pulverized remains of a thousand quivering whortleberries.
whortleberry-jelly.name: Whortleberry Jelly

wicked-bolognese-sauce.description: A small jar of wicked bolognese sauce, on spaghetti or on its own for a meaty treat.
wicked-bolognese-sauce.name: Wicked Bolognese Sauce
